title: Non-Repudiable Audit Log Specification (NRALS)
description: Mandatory structural and cryptographic requirements for all Governance Transaction Logs generated during GSEP-C L8 Certified Persistence (GRLC). These logs form the immutable basis for SIH forensic analysis.

requirements.mandate: Unique identifier for the SST instance.
Cryptographic signature of the executing Sovereign Agent, applied over the entire log payload, ensuring source non-repudiation.
Immutable record of timestamps and exit codes for all PRE through L9 GSEP stages.
Must include certified S-01, S-02 values, and the S-03 Veto status post-L7 check.
Must adhere to the minimum archival period defined in SIHM.
